sentences.en: ‘More cake?’ ‘No thanks, I couldn’t eat another thing.’
sentences.cn: “再来点蛋糕？” “不要了，谢谢。 我再也吃不下了。”

sentences.en: "Eat before Jul 14" was stamped on the label.
sentences.cn: 标签上印着“请于7月14日前食用”。

sentences.en: "Eat before JULY 14" was stamped on the label.
sentences.cn: 标签上盖有“7月14日前食用”的戳记。

sentences.en: "Helen had something to eat before she left," put in Cecil anxiously.
sentences.cn: “海伦走之前吃了点儿东西，”塞西尔急忙插了一句。

sentences.en: "What would you like to eat?" — "Anything'll do me, Eva."
sentences.cn: “你想吃什么？”——“我吃什么都行，伊娃。”

sentences.en: A feverish child refuses to eat and asks only for cold drinks.
sentences.cn: 发烧的孩子不愿吃东西，只会要冷饮。

sentences.en: A short time later they sat down to eat.
sentences.cn: 过了一小会儿，他们坐下来吃东西。

sentences.en: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.cn: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.en: an operating system that eats up 200Mb of disk space.
sentences.cn: 一个占用200兆字节磁盘空间的操作系统。

sentences.en: Does Rob eat fish?
sentences.cn: 罗布吃鱼吗？

sentences.en: Felix chatted cheerfully as he ate.
sentences.cn: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.en: Good eating habits are the best way of preventing infection.
sentences.cn: 良好的饮食习惯是预防感染的最佳方法。

sentences.en: He has had to eat his words about the company being recession-proof.
sentences.cn: 他不得不收回他说过的公司能免受经济衰退影响的话。

sentences.en: I exercise and eat right and get plenty of sleep.
sentences.cn: 我做运动，饮食得当，睡眠充足。

sentences.en: I'm &B{eaten up with} guilt.
sentences.cn: 我的心中充满了犯罪感。

sentences.en: if he comes back, I'll eat my hat.
sentences.cn: 如果他回来，就砍我的脑袋。

sentences.en: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
sentences.cn: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

sentences.en: It’s important to eat healthily when you are pregnant.
sentences.cn: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
sentences.cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

sentences.en: Maybe I eat too much and that's what makes me dozy.
sentences.cn: 也许我吃得太多了，所以昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: No chicken for me. I don’t eat meat (= I never eat meat ).
sentences.cn: 我不要鸡肉，我不吃肉的。

sentences.en: Nobody was allowed to eat in the Empress Dowager's presence.
sentences.cn: 在皇帝遗孀面前任何人不得进餐。

sentences.en: She can eat like a horse and never put on weight.
sentences.cn: 她可以吃得很多，但体重从来不会增加。

sentences.en: She really eats up the constant publicity.
sentences.cn: 她经常被宣传而乐不可支

sentences.en: She really eats up the constant publicity.
sentences.cn: 她经常被宣传而乐不可支

sentences.en: the acid began to eat away at the edge of her tunic.
sentences.cn: 酸开始逐渐地腐蚀她束腰外衣的边缘。

sentences.en: The crew of the ship gave them nothing but bread to eat.
sentences.cn: 船上的工作人员除了面包什么也不给他们吃。

sentences.en: the knowledge of his affair still ate away at her.
sentences.cn: 他的风流韵事对她的伤害仍然在慢慢加深。

sentences.en: The squad members paired off to find places to eat and sleep.
sentences.cn: 小组成员结对儿找地方吃饭睡觉。

sentences.en: they will eat their words when I win.
sentences.cn: 等我赢了，他们就会收回前言。

sentences.en: Try to eat at least four slices of bread a day.
sentences.cn: 每天尽量至少吃4片面包。

sentences.en: We had plenty to eat and drink.
sentences.cn: 我们有很多吃的喝的。

sentences.en: We stopped at McDonalds to get a bite to eat.
sentences.cn: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

sentences.en: Wendy popped in for a quick bite to eat on Monday night.
sentences.cn: 温迪周一晚上过来匆匆吃了点儿饭。

sentences.en: Would you like something to eat?
sentences.cn: 想吃点什么吗？

words.tran_cn: 侵蚀的；可生食的；进餐用的

phrases.tran_cn: 侵蚀；痛快地吃，尽情地吃
丢脸；被迫收回自己说的话

phrases.phrase: eat like a bird (或 a horse)

phrases.tran_cn: 因渴求（尤指得不到的人或物）而痛苦，憔悴
（尤指以屈辱方式）收回前言，承认错误
上馆子吃饭；锈坏；使腐烂

phrases.phrase: eat someone out of house and home
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)把某人吃穷；吃光某人的家当
完全占据了某人的思想，纠缠

phrases.phrase: eat something away (或 eat away at something)

phrases.tran_cn: 健康首选；吃得营养；吃的好；胃口好

phrases.phrase: have someone eating out of one's hand
phrases.tran_cn: 使某人俯首帖耳，使（某人）完全听命
(非正式)要是…就砍我的头（表示相信某事绝不会发生）
即食食品；速煮食品；方便食品

phrases.phrase: what's eating you (或 him 或 her)?
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)你（或他、她）在担心什么？你（或他、她）在为什么事烦恼？

trans.tran_en: to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it
to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it
